thread.section_title: Experthelp.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experthelp.com | www.experthelp.com
thread.title: Ian Lind

author: Ian Lind
title: Ian Lind
text: Great service, the only thing I didn't like was when I picked what I thought was ok and paid for it, another option popped up which was another cost, by the time I finished I had finished paying 3 times what I thought I was going to pay, and I was getting nervous about the whole thing, BUT this is because of past experience with another company, In the end I was very happy as my problem was sorted and very efficiently
